26.5.1   $C\left(n\right)=\frac{1}{n+1}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n}{n}=\frac{1}{2n+1} \genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n+1}{n}=\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n}{n}-\genfrac{(}{)} {0.0pt}{}{2n}{n-1}=\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n-1}{n}-\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n -1}{n+1}.$
26.5.2   $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}C\left(n\right)x^{n}=\frac{1-\sqrt{1-4x}}{2x},$
26.5.3   $C\left(n+1\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{n}C\left(k\right)C\left(n-k\right),$
26.5.4   $C\left(n+1\right)=\frac{2(2n+1)}{n+2}C\left(n\right),$
26.5.5   $C\left(n+1\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{\left\lfloor n/2\right\rfloor}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0 pt}{}{n}{2k}2^{n-2k}C\left(k\right).$
26.5.7   $\lim_{n\to\infty}\frac{C\left(n+1\right)}{C\left(n\right)}=4.$
26.6.1   $D(m,n)=\sum_{k=0}^{n}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n}{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{m+n- k}{n}=\sum_{k=0}^{n}2^{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{m}{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{ n}{k}.$
26.6.2   $M(n)=\sum_{k=0}^{n}\frac{(-1)^{k}}{n+2-k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n}{k}\genfrac {(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n+2-2k}{n+1-k}.$
26.6.3   $N(n,k)=\frac{1}{n}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n}{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n}{k-1}.$
26.6.4   $r(n)=D(n,n)-D(n+1,n-1),$
26.6.5   $\sum_{m,n=0}^{\infty}D(m,n)x^{m}y^{n}=\frac{1}{1-x-y-xy},$
26.6.6   $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}D(n,n)x^{n}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-6x+x^{2}}},$
26.6.7   $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}M(n)x^{n}=\frac{1-x-\sqrt{1-2x-3x^{2}}}{2x^{2}},$
26.6.8   $\sum_{n,k=1}^{\infty}N(n,k)x^{n}y^{k}=\frac{1-x-xy-\sqrt{(1-x-xy)^{2}-4x^{2}y} }{2x},$
26.6.9   $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}r(n)x^{n}=\frac{1-x-\sqrt{1-6x+x^{2}}}{2x}.$
26.6.10   $D(m,n)=D(m,n-1)+D(m-1,n)+D(m-1,n-1),$
26.6.11   $M(n)=M(n-1)+\sum_{k=2}^{n}M(k-2)\,M(n-k),$
26.6.12   $C\left(n\right)=\sum_{k=1}^{n}N(n,k),$
26.6.13   $M(n)=\sum_{k=0}^{n}(-1)^{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n}{k}C\left(n+1-k\right),$
26.6.14   $C\left(n\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{2n}(-1)^{k}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{2n}{k}M(2n-k).$
26.7.1   $B\left(0\right)=1,$

27.4.1   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}f(n)=\prod_{p}\left(1+\sum_{r=1}^{\infty}f(p^{r})\right),$
27.4.2   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}f(n)=\prod_{p}(1-f(p))^{-1}.$
27.4.3   $\zeta\left(s\right)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}n^{-s}=\prod_{p}(1-p^{-s})^{-1},$
27.4.4   $F(s)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}f(n)n^{-s},$
27.4.5   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\mu\left(n\right)n^{-s}=\frac{1}{\zeta\left(s\right)},$
27.4.6   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\phi\left(n\right)n^{-s}=\frac{\zeta\left(s-1\right)}{\zeta \left(s\right)},$
27.4.7   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\lambda\left(n\right)n^{-s}=\frac{\zeta\left(2s\right)}{ \zeta\left(s\right)},$
27.4.8   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}|\mu\left(n\right)|n^{-s}=\frac{\zeta\left(s\right)}{\zeta \left(2s\right)},$
27.4.9   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}2^{\nu\left(n\right)}n^{-s}=\frac{(\zeta\left(s\right))^{2} }{\zeta\left(2s\right)},$
27.4.10   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}d_{k}\left(n\right)n^{-s}=(\zeta\left(s\right))^{k},$
27.4.11   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\sigma_{\alpha}\left(n\right)n^{-s}=\zeta\left(s\right) \zeta\left(s-\alpha\right),$
27.4.12   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\Lambda\left(n\right)n^{-s}=-\frac{\zeta'\left(s\right)}{ \zeta\left(s\right)},$
27.4.13   $\sum_{n=2}^{\infty}(\ln n)n^{-s}=-\zeta'\left(s\right),$
27.5.1   $h(n)=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}f(d)g\left(\frac{n}{d}\right),$
27.5.2   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\mu\left(d\right)=\left\lfloor\frac{1}{n}\right\rfloor,$
27.5.3   $g(n)=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}f(d)\Longleftrightarrow f(n)=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}g(d) \mu\left(\frac{n}{d}\right).$
27.5.4   $n=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\phi\left(d\right)\Longleftrightarrow\phi\left(n\right)= \sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}d\mu\left(\frac{n}{d}\right),$
27.5.5   $\ln n=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\Lambda\left(d\right)\Longleftrightarrow\Lambda\left (n\right)=\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}(\ln d)\mu\left(\frac{n}{d}\right).$
27.5.6   $G(x)=\sum_{n\leq x}F\left(\frac{x}{n}\right)\Longleftrightarrow F(x)=\sum_{n \leq x}\mu\left(n\right)G\left(\frac{x}{n}\right),$
27.5.7   $G(x)=\sum_{m=1}^{\infty}\frac{F(mx)}{m^{s}}\Longleftrightarrow F(x)=\sum_{m=1} ^{\infty}\mu\left(m\right)\frac{G(mx)}{m^{s}},$
27.5.8   $g(n)=\prod_{d\mathbin{|}n}f(d)\Longleftrightarrow f(n)=\prod_{d\mathbin{|}n} \left(g\left(\frac{n}{d}\right)\right)^{\mu\left(d\right)}.$
27.6.1   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\lambda\left(d\right)=\begin{cases}1,&n\mbox{ is a square} ,\\ 0,&\mbox{otherwise}.\end{cases}$
27.6.2   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\mu\left(d\right)f(d)=\prod_{p\mathbin{|}n}(1-f(p)),$
27.6.3   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}|\mu\left(d\right)|=2^{\nu\left(n\right)},$
27.6.4   $\sum_{d^{2}\mathbin{|}n}\mu\left(d\right)=|\mu\left(n\right)|,$
27.6.5   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\frac{|\mu\left(d\right)|}{\phi\left(d\right)}=\frac{n}{ \phi\left(n\right)},$
27.6.6   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\phi_{k}\left(d\right)\left(\frac{n}{d}\right)^{k}=1^{k}+2 ^{k}+\dots+n^{k},$
27.6.7   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}\mu\left(d\right)\left(\frac{n}{d}\right)^{k}=J_{k}\left(n \right),$
27.6.8   $\sum_{d\mathbin{|}n}J_{k}\left(d\right)=n^{k}.$
27.7.1   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}f(n)\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}.$
27.7.2   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}f(n)\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\sum_{d \mathbin{|}n}f(d)x^{n}.$
27.7.3   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\mu\left(n\right)\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}=x,$
27.7.4   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\phi\left(n\right)\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}=\frac{x}{(1-x)^{2}},$
27.7.5   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}n^{\alpha}\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\sigma_{ \alpha}\left(n\right)x^{n},$
27.7.6   $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\lambda\left(n\right)\frac{x^{n}}{1-x^{n}}=\sum_{n=1}^{ \infty}x^{n^{2}}.$

27.8.2   $m,n=1,2,\dots$,
27.8.3   $\chi\left(n+k\right)=\chi\left(n\right),$
27.8.3   $n=1,2,\dots$,
27.8.4   $\chi\left(n\right)=0,$

28.10.2   $\frac{2}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\ifrac{\pi}{2}}\cosh\left(2h\sin z\sin t\right)\mathrm{ ce}_{2n}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{A_{0}^{2n}(h^{2})}{\mathrm{ce}_{ 2n}\left(0,h^{2}\right)}\mathrm{ce}_{2n}\left(z,h^{2}\right),$
28.10.3   $\frac{2}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\ifrac{\pi}{2}}\sin\left(2h\cos z\cos t\right)\mathrm{ ce}_{2n+1}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=-\frac{hA_{1}^{2n+1}(h^{2})}{\mathrm {ce}_{2n+1}'\left(\frac{1}{2}\pi,h^{2}\right)}\mathrm{ce}_{2n+1}\left(z,h^{2} \right),$

28.10.5   $\frac{2}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\ifrac{\pi}{2}}\sinh\left(2h\sin z\sin t\right)\mathrm{ se}_{2n+1}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{hB_{1}^{2n+1}(h^{2})}{\mathrm{ se}_{2n+1}'\left(0,h^{2}\right)}\mathrm{se}_{2n+1}\left(z,h^{2}\right),$
28.10.6   $\frac{2}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\ifrac{\pi}{2}}\sin z\sin t\cos\left(2h\cos z\cos t \right)\mathrm{se}_{2n+1}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{B_{1}^{2n+1}(h^ {2})}{2\mathrm{se}_{2n+1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\pi,h^{2}\right)}\mathrm{se}_{2n+1} \left(z,h^{2}\right),$
28.10.7   $\frac{2}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\ifrac{\pi}{2}}\sin z\sin t\sin\left(2h\cos z\cos t \right)\mathrm{se}_{2n+2}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=-\frac{hB_{2}^{2n+2}( h^{2})}{2\mathrm{se}_{2n+2}'\left(\frac{1}{2}\pi,h^{2}\right)}\mathrm{se}_{2n+ 2}\left(z,h^{2}\right),$

28.28.11   $\int_{0}^{\infty}e^{2\mathrm{i}h\cosh z\cosh t}\mathrm{Ce}_{\nu}\left(t,h^{2} \right)\mathrm{d}t=\tfrac{1}{2}\pi\mathrm{i}e^{\mathrm{i}\nu\pi}\mathrm{ce}_{ \nu}\left(0,h^{2}\right){\mathrm{M}^{(3)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right),$

28.28.15   $\int_{0}^{\infty}\cos\left(2h\cos y\cosh t\right)\mathrm{Ce}_{2n}\left(t,h^{2} \right)\mathrm{d}t=(-1)^{n+1}\tfrac{1}{2}\pi{\mathrm{Mc}^{(2)}_{2n}}\left(0,h \right)\mathrm{ce}_{2n}\left(y,h^{2}\right),$
28.28.16   $\int_{0}^{\infty}\sin\left(2h\cos y\cosh t\right)\mathrm{Ce}_{2n}\left(t,h^{2} \right)\mathrm{d}t=-\dfrac{\pi A_{0}^{2n}(h^{2})}{2\mathrm{ce}_{2n}\left(\frac {1}{2}\pi,h^{2}\right)}\*\left(\mathrm{ce}_{2n}\left(y,h^{2}\right)\mp\dfrac{2 }{\pi C_{2n}(h^{2})}\mathrm{fe}_{2n}\left(y,h^{2}\right)\right),$
28.28.17   $\dfrac{1}{\pi}\int_{0}^{\pi}\mathcal{C}^{(j)}_{\nu+2s}(2hR)e^{-\mathrm{i}(\nu+ 2s)\phi}\mathrm{me}_{\nu}\left(t,h^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=(-1)^{s}c^{\nu}_{2s}( h^{2}){\mathrm{M}^{(j)}_{\nu}}\left(z,h\right),$
28.28.18   $R(z,t)=\left(\tfrac{1}{2}(\cosh\left(2z\right)+\cos\left(2t\right))\right)^{ \ifrac{1}{2}},$
28.28.18   $R(z,0)=\cosh z,$
28.28.19   $e^{2\mathrm{i}\phi}=\dfrac{\cosh\left(z+\mathrm{i}t\right)}{\cosh\left(z- \mathrm{i}t\right)},$
28.28.19   $\phi(z,0)=0.$

28.28.24   $\mathrm{D}_{0}\left(\nu,\mu,z\right)={\mathrm{M}^{(3)}_{\nu}}\left(z\right){ \mathrm{M}^{(4)}_{\mu}}\left(z\right)-{\mathrm{M}^{(4)}_{\nu}}\left(z\right){ \mathrm{M}^{(3)}_{\mu}}\left(z\right),$

28.28.25   $\dfrac{\sinh z}{\pi^{2}}\int_{0}^{2\pi}\dfrac{\cos t\mathrm{me}_{\nu}\left(t,h ^{2}\right)\mathrm{me}_{-\nu-2m-1}\left(t,h^{2}\right)}{{\sinh^{2}}z+{\sin^{2} }t}\mathrm{d}t=(-1)^{m+1}\mathrm{i}h\alpha^{(0)}_{\nu,m}\mathrm{D}_{0}\left( \nu,\nu+2m+1,z\right),$

28.28.41   $\dfrac{\cosh z}{\pi^{2}}\int_{0}^{2\pi}\dfrac{\sin t\mathrm{se}_{n}\left(t,h^{ 2}\right)\mathrm{ce}_{m}\left(t,h^{2}\right)}{{\sinh^{2}}z+{\sin^{2}}t}\mathrm {d}t=(-1)^{p+1}\mathrm{i}h\widehat{\beta}_{n,m}\mathrm{Dsc}_{0}\left(n,m,z \right),$
28.28.42   $\dfrac{\sinh z}{\pi^{2}}\int_{0}^{2\pi}\dfrac{\cos t\mathrm{se}_{n}'\left(t,h^ {2}\right)\mathrm{ce}_{m}\left(t,h^{2}\right)}{{\sinh^{2}}z+{\sin^{2}}t} \mathrm{d}t=(-1)^{p}\mathrm{i}h\widehat{\beta}_{n,m}\mathrm{Dsc}_{1}\left(n,m, z\right),$

28.29.5   $w_{\mbox{\tiny II}}(z+\pi,\lambda)=w_{\mbox{\tiny II}}(\pi,\lambda)w_{\mbox{ \tiny I}}(z,\lambda)+w^{\prime}_{\mbox{\tiny II}}(\pi,\lambda)w_{\mbox{\tiny II }}(z,\lambda).$

28.31.6   $-2\eta A_{0}+(2+p)\xi A_{2}=0,$
28.31.6   $p\xi A_{0}+(4-\eta)A_{2}+\left(\tfrac{1}{2}p+2\right)\xi A_{4}=0,$
28.31.6   $(\tfrac{1}{2}p-\ell+1)\xi A_{2\ell-2}+\left(4\ell^{2}-\eta\right)A_{2\ell}+( \tfrac{1}{2}p+\ell+1)\xi A_{2\ell+2}=0,$

28.31.8   $\left(1-\eta-\left(\tfrac{1}{2}p+\tfrac{1}{2}\right)\xi\right)B_{1}+\left( \tfrac{1}{2}p+\tfrac{3}{2}\right)\xi B_{3}=0,$

28.31.11   $\begin{array}[]{cl}S_{2n+1}^{2m+1}(z,\xi)&\mbox{with $p=2n+1$},\\ S_{2n+2}^{2m+2}(z,\xi)&\mbox{with $p=2n+2$},\end{array}$

28.31.16   $\mathit{hc}_{p}^{m}(z,\xi)=e^{-\frac{1}{4}\xi\cos\left(2z\right)}C_{p}^{m}(z, \xi),$

28.31.21   $\int_{0}^{2\pi}\mathit{hc}_{p}^{m_{1}}(x,\xi)\mathit{hc}_{p}^{m_{2}}(x,\xi) \mathrm{d}x=\int_{0}^{2\pi}\mathit{hs}_{p}^{m_{1}}(x,\xi)\mathit{hs}_{p}^{m_{2 }}(x,\xi)\mathrm{d}x=0.$

30.15.1   $\phi_{n}(t)=\sqrt{\frac{2n+1}{2\tau}}\sqrt{\Lambda_{n}}\mathsf{Ps}^{0}_{n} \left(\frac{t}{\tau},\gamma^{2}\right),$
30.15.1   $n=0,1,2,\dots$,
30.15.2   $\Lambda_{n}=\frac{2\gamma}{\pi}\left(K_{n}^{0}(\gamma)A_{n}^{0}(\gamma^{2}) \right)^{2};$
30.15.3   $\int_{-\tau}^{\tau}\frac{\sin\sigma(t-s)}{\pi(t-s)}\phi_{n}(s)\mathrm{d}s= \Lambda_{n}\phi_{n}(t).$
30.15.4   $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}e^{-\mathrm{i}t\omega}\phi_{n}(t)\mathrm{d}t=(-\mathrm{ i})^{n}\sqrt{\frac{2\pi\tau}{\sigma\Lambda_{n}}}\phi_{n}\left(\frac{\tau}{ \sigma}\omega\right)\chi_{\sigma}(\omega),$
30.15.5   $\int_{-\tau}^{\tau}e^{-\mathrm{i}t\omega}\phi_{n}(t)\mathrm{d}t=(-\mathrm{i})^ {n}\sqrt{\frac{2\pi\tau\Lambda_{n}}{\sigma}}\phi_{n}\left(\frac{\tau}{\sigma} \omega\right),$
30.15.6   $\chi_{\sigma}(\omega)=\begin{cases}1,&\mbox{$|\omega|\leq\sigma$},\\ 0,&\mbox{$|\omega|>\sigma$}.\end{cases}$
30.15.7   $\int_{-\tau}^{\tau}\phi_{k}(t)\phi_{n}(t)\mathrm{d}t=\Lambda_{n}\delta_{k,n},$
30.15.8   $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\phi_{k}(t)\phi_{n}(t)\mathrm{d}t=\delta_{k,n}.$
30.15.9   $\beta=\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_{-\sigma}^{\sigma}\left|\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}e^{- \mathrm{i}t\omega}f(t)\mathrm{d}t\right|^{2}\mathrm{d}\omega$
30.15.10   $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}|f(t)|^{2}\mathrm{d}t=1,$
30.15.10   $\int_{-\tau}^{\tau}|f(t)|^{2}\mathrm{d}t=\alpha,$
30.15.11   $\operatorname{arccos}\sqrt{\mathrm{B}}+\operatorname{arccos}\sqrt{\alpha}= \operatorname{arccos}\sqrt{\Lambda_{0}},$
30.15.12   $\mathrm{B}=\left(\sqrt{\Lambda_{0}\alpha}+\sqrt{1-\Lambda_{0}}\sqrt{1-\alpha} \right)^{2}.$
30.15.13   $f(t)=a\phi_{0}(t)\chi_{\tau}(t)+b\phi_{0}(t)(1-\chi_{\tau}(t)),$
30.15.13   $a=\sqrt{\frac{\alpha}{\Lambda_{0}}},$
30.15.13   $b=\sqrt{\frac{1-\alpha}{1-\Lambda_{0}}}.$

31.10.1   $W(z)=\int_{C}\mathcal{K}(z,t)w(t)\rho(t)\mathrm{d}t$

31.10.7   $\cos\theta=\left(\frac{zt}{a}\right)^{1/2},$

31.10.12   $W(z)=\int_{C_{1}}\int_{C_{2}}\mathcal{K}(z;s,t)w(s)w(t)\rho(s,t)\mathrm{d}s \mathrm{d}t$

31.10.18   $\frac{{\partial}^{2}\mathcal{K}}{{\partial u}^{2}}+\frac{{\partial}^{2} \mathcal{K}}{{\partial v}^{2}}+\frac{{\partial}^{2}\mathcal{K}}{{\partial w}^{ 2}}+\frac{2\gamma-1}{u}\frac{\partial\mathcal{K}}{\partial u}+\frac{2\delta-1} {v}\frac{\partial\mathcal{K}}{\partial v}+\frac{2\epsilon-1}{w}\frac{\partial \mathcal{K}}{\partial w}=0.$

35.3.1   $\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right)=\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{ X}\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.3.2   $\Gamma_{m}\left(s_{1},\dots,s_{m}\right)=\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr }\left(-\mathbf{X}\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{s_{m}-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\prod_{j=1}^{m-1 }|(\mathbf{X})_{j}|^{s_{j}-s_{j+1}}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.3.2   $s_{j}\in\mathbb{C}$, $\Re(s_{j})>\frac{1}{2}(j-1)$, $j=1,\dots,m$.
35.3.3   ${}\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(a,b\right)=\int\limits_{\boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}< \mathbf{I}}|\mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{X}|^{b-\frac{1 }{2}(m+1)}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.3.4   $\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right)=\pi^{m(m-1)/4}\prod_{j=1}^{m}\Gamma\left(a-\tfrac{1}{ 2}(j-1)\right).$
35.3.5   $\Gamma_{m}\left(s_{1},\dots,s_{m}\right)=\pi^{m(m-1)/4}\prod_{j=1}^{m}\Gamma \left(s_{j}-\tfrac{1}{2}(j-1)\right).$
35.3.6   $\Gamma_{m}\left(a,\dots,a\right)=\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right).$
35.3.7   $\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(a,b\right)=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(b \right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(a+b\right)}.$
35.3.8   $\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(a,b\right)=\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}|\mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac {1}{2}(m+1)}|\mathbf{I}+\mathbf{X}|^{-(a+b)}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.4.1   ${\left[a\right]_{\kappa}}=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(a+\kappa\right)}{\Gamma_{m} \left(a\right)}=\prod_{j=1}^{m}{\left(a-\tfrac{1}{2}(j-1)\right)_{k_{j}}},$
35.4.2   $Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{I}\right)=|\kappa|!\,2^{2|\kappa|}\,{\left[m/2\right]_ {\kappa}}\frac{\prod\limits_{1\leq j<l\leq\ell(\kappa)}(2k_{j}-2k_{l}-j+l)}{ \prod\limits_{j=1}^{\ell(\kappa)}(2k_{j}+\ell(\kappa)-j)!}$
35.4.3   $Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{I}\right)\,|\mathbf{ T}|^{k_{m}}\*\int\limits_{\mathbf{O}(m)}\prod_{j=1}^{m-1}|(\mathbf{H}\mathbf{T }\mathbf{H}^{-1})_{j}|^{k_{j}-k_{j+1}}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{H},$
35.4.4   $Z_{\kappa}\left(\boldsymbol{{0}}\right)=\begin{cases}1,&\kappa=(0,\dots,0),\\ 0,&\kappa\neq(0,\dots,0).\end{cases}$
35.4.5   $Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{H}\mathbf{T}\mathbf{H}^{-1}\right)=Z_{\kappa}\left( \mathbf{T}\right),$
35.4.6   $\sum_{|\kappa|=k}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=(\operatorname{tr}{\mathbf{ T}})^{k}.$
35.4.7   $\int_{\mathbf{O}(m)}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{S}\mathbf{H}\mathbf{T}\mathbf{H}^{ -1}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{H}=\frac{Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{S}\right)Z_{ \kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)}{Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{I}\right)}.$
35.4.8   $\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)\,| \mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{X}\right)\mathrm{d} \mathbf{X}=\Gamma_{m}\left(a+\kappa\right)\,|\mathbf{T}|^{-a}Z_{\kappa}\left( \mathbf{T}^{-1}\right),$
35.4.9   $\int\limits_{\boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}<\mathbf{I}}|\mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac{1}{2 }(m+1)}\*|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{X}|^{b-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T }\mathbf{X}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X}=\frac{{\left[a\right]_{\kappa}}}{{\left [a+b\right]_{\kappa}}}\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(a,b\right)Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T} \right).$
35.5.1   $A_{\nu}\left(\boldsymbol{{0}}\right)=\frac{1}{\Gamma_{m}\left(\nu+\frac{1}{2}( m+1)\right)},$
35.5.2   $A_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=A_{\nu}\left(\boldsymbol{{0}}\right)\sum_{k=0}^ {\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}}{k!}\sum_{|\kappa|=k}\frac{1}{{\left[\nu+\frac{1}{2}(m+ 1)\right]_{\kappa}}}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right),$
35.5.3   $B_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-( \mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}+\mathbf{X}^{-1})\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{\nu-\frac{1}{2}(m+1) }\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.5.4   $\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)| \mathbf{X}|^{\nu}A_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{S}\mathbf{X}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X}= \mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{S}\mathbf{T}^{-1}\right)|\mathbf{T}|^{-\nu-\frac{1} {2}(m+1)},$
35.5.5   $\int\limits_{\boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}<\mathbf{T}}A_{\nu_{1}}\left(\mathbf{S }_{1}\mathbf{X}\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{\nu_{1}}\*A_{\nu_{2}}\left(\mathbf{S}_{2}( \mathbf{T}-\mathbf{X})\right)|\mathbf{T}-\mathbf{X}|^{\nu_{2}}\mathrm{d} \mathbf{X}=|\mathbf{T}|^{\nu_{1}+\nu_{2}+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}A_{\nu_{1}+\nu_{2}+ \frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\left((\mathbf{S}_{1}+\mathbf{S}_{2})\mathbf{T}\right),$
35.5.5   $\nu_{j}\in\mathbb{C}$, $\Re(\nu_{j})>-1$, $j=1,2$; $\mathbf{S}_{1},\mathbf{S}_{2}\in\boldsymbol{\mathcal{S}}$; $\mathbf{T}\in{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}$.
35.5.6   $B_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=|\mathbf{T}|^{-\nu}B_{-\nu}\left(\mathbf{T} \right),$
35.5.7   $\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}A_{\nu_{1}}\left(\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)B_{-\nu_ {2}}\left(\mathbf{S}\mathbf{X}\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{\nu_{1}}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X }=\frac{1}{A_{\nu_{1}+\nu_{2}}\left(\boldsymbol{{0}}\right)}|\mathbf{S}|^{\nu_ {2}}|\mathbf{T}+\mathbf{S}|^{-(\nu_{1}+\nu_{2}+\frac{1}{2}(m+1))},$
35.5.8   $\int_{\mathbf{O}(m)}\mathrm{etr}\left(\mathbf{S}\mathbf{H}\right)\mathrm{d} \mathbf{H}=\frac{A_{-1/2}\left(-\frac{1}{4}\mathbf{S}\mathbf{S}^{\mathrm{T}} \right)}{A_{-1/2}\left(\boldsymbol{{0}}\right)},$
35.6.1   ${{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a\atop b};\mathbf{T}\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{1}{k! }\sum_{|\kappa|=k}\frac{{\left[a\right]_{\kappa}}}{{\left[b\right]_{\kappa}}}Z _{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right).$
35.6.2   $\Psi\left(a;b;\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{1}{\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right)}\int_{ \boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)|\mathbf{X}| ^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\*{|\mathbf{I}+\mathbf{X}|}^{b-a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\mathrm {d}\mathbf{X},$
35.6.3   $L^{(\gamma)}_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(\gamma+\nu+ \frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(\gamma+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)}\*{{}_ {1}F_{1}}\left({-\nu\atop\gamma+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)};\mathbf{T}\right),$
35.6.4   ${{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a\atop b};\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(a ,b-a\right)}\int\limits_{\boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}<\mathbf{I}}\mathrm{etr} \left(\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)|\mathbf{X}|^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}|\mathbf{I}- \mathbf{X}|^{b-a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.6.5   $\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}\mathrm{etr}\left(-\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}\right)| \mathbf{X}|^{b-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}{{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a\atop b};\mathbf{S} \mathbf{X}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X}=\Gamma_{m}\left(b\right)|\mathbf{I}- \mathbf{S}\mathbf{T}^{-1}|^{-a}|\mathbf{T}|^{-b},$
35.6.6   $\mathrm{B}_{m}\left(b_{1},b_{2}\right)|\mathbf{T}|^{b_{1}+b_{2}-\frac{1}{2}(m+ 1)}{{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a_{1}+a_{2}\atop b_{1}+b_{2}};\mathbf{T}\right)=\int_{ \boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}<\mathbf{T}}|\mathbf{X}|^{b_{1}-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}{{ }_{1}F_{1}}\left({a_{1}\atop b_{1}};\mathbf{X}\right){|\mathbf{T}-\mathbf{X}|} ^{b_{2}-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}{{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a_{2}\atop b_{2}};\mathbf{T}- \mathbf{X}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.6.7   ${{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a\atop b};\mathbf{T}\right)=\mathrm{etr}\left(\mathbf{T} \right){{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({b-a\atop b};-\mathbf{T}\right).$
35.6.8   $\int_{\boldsymbol{\Omega}}|\mathbf{T}|^{c-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\Psi\left(a;b; \mathbf{T}\right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{T}=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(c\right)\Gamma_{m} \left(a-c\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(c-b+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(a \right)\Gamma_{m}\left(a-b+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)},$
35.6.9   $\lim_{a\to\infty}{{}_{1}F_{1}}\left({a\atop\nu+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)};-a^{-1} \mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{A_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)}{A_{\nu}\left( \boldsymbol{{0}}\right)}.$
35.6.10   $\lim_{a\to\infty}\Gamma_{m}\left(a\right)\Psi\left(a+\nu;\nu+\tfrac{1}{2}(m+1) ;a^{-1}\mathbf{T}\right)=B_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right).$
35.7.1   ${{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{T}\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{1} {k!}\sum_{|\kappa|=k}\frac{{\left[a\right]_{\kappa}}{\left[b\right]_{\kappa}}} {{\left[c\right]_{\kappa}}}Z_{\kappa}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)},$
35.7.2   $P^{(\gamma,\delta)}_{\nu}\left(\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(\gamma+ \nu+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(\gamma+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\right)}\* {{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({-\nu,\gamma+\delta+\nu+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)\atop\gamma+\frac{1 }{2}(m+1)};\mathbf{T}\right),$
35.7.3   ${{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\begin{bmatrix}t_{1}&0\\ 0&t_{2}\end{bmatrix}\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{k}}{ \left(c-a\right)_{k}}{\left(b\right)_{k}}{\left(c-b\right)_{k}}}{k!\,{\left(c \right)_{2k}}{\left(c-\tfrac{1}{2}\right)_{k}}}\*(t_{1}t_{2})^{k}{{}_{2}F_{1}} \left({a+k,b+k\atop c+2k};t_{1}+t_{2}-t_{1}t_{2}\right).$
35.7.4   $\lim_{c\to\infty}{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{I}-c\mathbf{T}^{-1} \right)=|\mathbf{T}|^{b}\Psi\left(b;b-a+\tfrac{1}{2}(m+1);\mathbf{T}\right).$
35.7.5   ${{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{B}_{m}\left (a,c-a\right)}\int\limits_{\boldsymbol{{0}}<\mathbf{X}<\mathbf{I}}|\mathbf{X}| ^{a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}\*{|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{X}|}^{c-a-\frac{1}{2}(m+1)}{| \mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T}\mathbf{X}|}^{-b}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{X},$
35.7.6   ${{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{T}\right)=|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T}|^{c-a -b}{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({c-a,c-b\atop c};\mathbf{T}\right)=|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T }|^{-a}{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,c-b\atop c};-\mathbf{T}(\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T})^{- 1}\right)=|\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T}|^{-b}{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({c-a,b\atop c};- \mathbf{T}(\mathbf{I}-\mathbf{T})^{-1}\right).$
35.7.7   ${{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{I}\right)=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(c \right)\Gamma_{m}\left(c-a-b\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(c-a\right)\Gamma_{m}\left (c-b\right)}},$
35.7.8   ${{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop c};\mathbf{T}\right)=\frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(c \right)\Gamma_{m}\left(c-a-b\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(c-a\right)\Gamma_{m}\left (c-b\right)}}\*{{}_{2}F_{1}}\left({a,b\atop a+b-c+\frac{1}{2}(m+1)};\mathbf{I} -\mathbf{T}\right),$
35.7.9   $t_{j}(1-t_{j})\frac{{\partial}^{2}F}{{\partial t_{j}}^{2}}-\frac{1}{2}\sum_{ \begin{subarray}{c}k=1\\ k\neq j\end{subarray}}^{m}\frac{t_{k}(1-t_{k})}{t_{j}-t_{k}}\frac{\partial F}{ \partial t_{k}}+\left({c-\tfrac{1}{2}(m-1)-\left(a+b-\tfrac{1}{2}(m-3)\right)t _{j}}+\frac{1}{2}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}k=1\\ k\neq j\end{subarray}}^{m}\frac{t_{j}(1-t_{j})}{t_{j}-t_{k}}\right)\frac{ \partial F}{\partial t_{j}}=abF,$

35.8.5   ${{}_{3}F_{2}}\left({a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\atop b_{1},b_{2}};\mathbf{I}\right)= \frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{2}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(c\right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(b_ {2}-a_{3}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(c+a_{3}\right)}\*{{}_{3}F_{2}}\left({b_{1}-a_{ 1},b_{1}-a_{2},a_{3}\atop b_{1},c+a_{3}};\mathbf{I}\right),$
35.8.6   ${{}_{3}F_{2}}\left({a_{1},a_{2},a_{3}\atop b_{1},b_{2}};\mathbf{I}\right)= \frac{\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{1}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{2}\right)}{ \Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{1}-a_{2}\right)}\*\frac{ \Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{3}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{1}-a_{2}-a_{3} \right)}{\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{1}-a_{3}\right)\Gamma_{m}\left(b_{1}-a_{2}-a _{3}\right)}.$

36.10.3   $\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi_{1}}{{\partial x}^{2}}-\frac{x}{3}\Psi_{1}=0.$
36.10.4   $\frac{{\partial}^{3}\Psi_{2}}{{\partial x}^{3}}-\frac{1}{2}y\frac{\partial\Psi _{2}}{\partial x}-\frac{i}{4}x\Psi_{2}=0.$
36.10.5   $\frac{{\partial}^{4}\Psi_{3}}{{\partial x}^{4}}-\frac{3}{5}z\frac{{\partial}^{ 2}\Psi_{3}}{{\partial x}^{2}}-\frac{2i}{5}y\frac{\partial\Psi_{3}}{\partial x} +\frac{1}{5}x\Psi_{3}=0.$
36.10.6   $\frac{{\partial}^{ln}\Psi_{K}}{{\partial x_{m}}^{ln}}=i^{n(l-m)}\frac{{ \partial}^{mn}\Psi_{K}}{{\partial x_{l}}^{mn}},$
36.10.7   $\frac{{\partial}^{2n}\Psi_{2}}{{\partial x}^{2n}}=i^{n}\frac{{\partial}^{n} \Psi_{2}}{{\partial y}^{n}}.$
36.10.8   $\frac{{\partial}^{2n}\Psi_{3}}{{\partial x}^{2n}}=i^{n}\frac{{\partial}^{n} \Psi_{3}}{{\partial y}^{n}},$
36.10.9   $\frac{{\partial}^{3n}\Psi_{3}}{{\partial x}^{3n}}=(-1)^{n}\frac{{\partial}^{n} \Psi_{3}}{{\partial z}^{n}},$
36.10.10   $\frac{{\partial}^{3n}\Psi_{3}}{{\partial y}^{3n}}=i^{n}\frac{{\partial}^{2n} \Psi_{3}}{{\partial z}^{2n}}.$

36.10.12   ${\Phi_{s}^{(\mathrm{U})}}\left(s,t;\mathbf{x}\right)=\frac{\partial}{\partial s }\Phi^{(\mathrm{U})}\left(s,t;\mathbf{x}\right),$
36.10.12   ${\Phi_{t}^{(\mathrm{U})}}\left(s,t;\mathbf{x}\right)=\frac{\partial}{\partial t }\Phi^{(\mathrm{U})}\left(s,t;\mathbf{x}\right).$
36.10.13   $6\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{\partial x\partial y}-2iz\frac{ \partial\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{\partial y}+y\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}=0,$
36.10.14   $3\left(\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{{\partial x}^{2}}-\frac{{ \partial}^{2}\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{{\partial y}^{2}}\right)+2iz\frac{\partial \Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{\partial x}-x\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}=0.$

36.10.16   $3\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi^{(\mathrm{H})}}{{\partial y}^{2}}+iz\frac{\partial \Psi^{(\mathrm{H})}}{\partial x}-y\Psi^{(\mathrm{H})}=0.$
36.10.17   $i\frac{\partial\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{\partial z}=\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi^{( \mathrm{E})}}{{\partial x}^{2}}+\frac{{\partial}^{2}\Psi^{(\mathrm{E})}}{{ \partial y}^{2}},$

36.11.3   $\Psi_{2}\left(0,y\right)=\begin{cases}\sqrt{\ifrac{\pi}{y}}\left(\exp\left( \tfrac{1}{4}i\pi\right)+o\left(1\right)\right),&y\to+\infty,\\ \sqrt{\ifrac{\pi}{|y|}}\exp\left(-\tfrac{1}{4}i\pi\right)\left(1+i\sqrt{2}\exp \left(-\frac{1}{4}iy^{2}\right)+o\left(1\right)\right),&y\to-\infty.\end{cases}$
36.11.4   $\Psi_{3}\left(x,0,0\right)=\frac{\sqrt{2\pi}}{(5|x|^{3})^{1/8}}\begin{cases} \exp\left(-2\sqrt{2}(\ifrac{x}{5})^{5/4}\right)\left(\cos\left(2\sqrt{2}( \ifrac{x}{5})^{5/4}-\tfrac{1}{8}\pi\right)+o\left(1\right)\right),&x\to+\infty ,\\ \cos\left(4(\ifrac{|x|}{5})^{5/4}-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)+o\left(1\right),&x\to -\infty.\end{cases}$

36.12.1   $I(\mathbf{y},k)=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\exp\left(ikf(u;\mathbf{y})\right)g(u, \mathbf{y})\mathrm{d}u,$

36.12.9   $P_{mn}(\mathbf{y})={(t_{n}(\mathbf{x}(\mathbf{y})))^{K+1}}+\sum_{l=m+2}^{K} \frac{l}{K+2}x_{l}(\mathbf{y}){(t_{n}(\mathbf{x}(\mathbf{y})))^{l-1}},$
36.12.10   $G_{n}(\mathbf{y})=g(t_{n}(\mathbf{y}),\mathbf{y})\sqrt{\frac{\ifrac{{\partial} ^{2}\Phi_{K}\left(t_{n}(\mathbf{x}(\mathbf{y}));\mathbf{x}(\mathbf{y})\right)} {{\partial t}^{2}}}{\ifrac{{\partial}^{2}f(u_{n}(\mathbf{y}))}{{\partial u}^{2 }}}}.$
36.12.11   $I(y,k)=\frac{\Delta^{1/4}\pi\sqrt{2}}{k^{1/3}}\exp\left(ik\widetilde{f}\right) \left(\left(\frac{g_{+}}{\sqrt{f_{+}^{\prime\prime}}}+\frac{g_{-}}{\sqrt{-f_{- }^{\prime\prime}}}\right)\mathrm{Ai}\left(-k^{2/3}\Delta\right)\left(1+O\left( \frac{1}{k}\right)\right)-i\left(\frac{g_{+}}{\sqrt{f_{+}^{\prime\prime}}}- \frac{g_{-}}{\sqrt{-f_{-}^{\prime\prime}}}\right)\frac{\mathrm{Ai}'\left(-k^{2 /3}\Delta\right)}{k^{1/3}\Delta^{1/2}}\left(1+O\left(\frac{1}{k}\right)\right) \right),$
36.12.12   $\widetilde{f}=\tfrac{1}{2}(f(u_{+}(y),y)+f(u_{-}(y),y)),$

36.9.4   $|\Psi_{2}\left(x,y\right)|^{2}=\int_{0}^{\infty}\left(\Psi_{1}\left(\frac{4u^{ 3}+2uy+x}{u^{1/3}}\right)+\Psi_{1}\left(\frac{4u^{3}+2uy-x}{u^{1/3}}\right) \right)\frac{\mathrm{d}u}{u^{1/3}}.$
36.9.5   $|\Psi_{2}\left(x,y\right)|^{2}=2\int_{0}^{\infty}\cos\left(2xu\right)\Psi_{1} \left(2u^{2/3}(y+2u^{2})\right)\frac{\mathrm{d}u}{u^{1/3}}.$
36.9.6   $|\Psi_{3}\left(x,y,z\right)|^{2}=2^{4/5}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\Psi_{3}\left(2 ^{4/5}(x+2uy+3u^{2}z+5u^{4}),0,2^{2/5}(z+10u^{2})\right)\mathrm{d}u.$

36.9.8   $\left|\Psi^{(\mathrm{H})}\left(x,y,z\right)\right|^{2}=8\pi^{2}\left(\frac{2}{ 9}\right)^{1/3}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\mathrm{Ai}\left( \left(\frac{4}{3}\right)^{1/3}(x+zv+3u^{2})\right)\mathrm{Ai}\left(\left(\frac {4}{3}\right)^{1/3}(y+zu+3v^{2})\right)\mathrm{d}u\mathrm{d}v.$

4.23.38   $\beta=\tfrac{1}{2}\left((x+1)^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{1/2}-\tfrac{1}{2}\left((x-1)^{ 2}+y^{2}\right)^{1/2}.$
4.23.39   $\operatorname{gd}\left(x\right)=\int_{0}^{x}\operatorname{sech}t\mathrm{d}t,$
4.23.40   $\operatorname{gd}\left(x\right)=2\operatorname{arctan}\left(e^{x}\right)- \tfrac{1}{2}\pi\\ =\operatorname{arcsin}\left(\tanh x\right)=\operatorname{arccsc}\left(\coth x \right)\\ =\operatorname{arccos}\left(\operatorname{sech}x\right)=\operatorname{arcsec} \left(\cosh x\right)\\ =\operatorname{arctan}\left(\sinh x\right)=\operatorname{arccot}\left( \operatorname{csch}x\right).$
4.23.41   ${\operatorname{gd}^{-1}}\left(x\right)=\int_{0}^{x}\sec t\mathrm{d}t,$
4.23.42   ${\operatorname{gd}^{-1}}\left(x\right)=\ln\tan\left(\tfrac{1}{2}x+\tfrac{1}{4} \pi\right)=\ln\left(\sec x+\tan x\right)=\operatorname{arcsinh}\left(\tan x \right)=\operatorname{arccsch}\left(\cot x\right)=\operatorname{arccosh}\left( \sec x\right)=\operatorname{arcsech}\left(\cos x\right)=\operatorname{arctanh} \left(\sin x\right)=\operatorname{arccoth}\left(\csc x\right).$
4.24.1   $\operatorname{arcsin}z=z+\frac{1}{2}\frac{z^{3}}{3}+\frac{1\cdot 3}{2\cdot 4} \frac{z^{5}}{5}+\frac{1\cdot 3\cdot 5}{2\cdot 4\cdot 6}\frac{z^{7}}{7}+\cdots,$
4.24.2   $\operatorname{arccos}z=(2(1-z))^{1/2}\*\left(1+\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\frac{1\cdot 3 \cdot 5\cdots(2n-1)}{2^{2n}(2n+1)n!}(1-z)^{n}\right),$
4.24.3   $\operatorname{arctan}z=z-\frac{z^{3}}{3}+\frac{z^{5}}{5}-\frac{z^{7}}{7}+\cdots,$
4.24.4   $\operatorname{arctan}z=\pm\frac{\pi}{2}-\frac{1}{z}+\frac{1}{3z^{3}}-\frac{1}{ 5z^{5}}+\cdots,$
4.24.5   $\operatorname{arctan}z=\frac{z}{z^{2}+1}\*\left(1+\frac{2}{3}\frac{z^{2}}{1+z^ {2}}+\frac{2\cdot 4}{3\cdot 5}\left(\frac{z^{2}}{1+z^{2}}\right)^{2}+\cdots \right),$
4.24.6   $x^{2}-y^{2}=-\tfrac{1}{2}.$
4.24.7   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arcsin}z=(1-z^{2})^{-1/2},$
4.24.8   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arccos}z=-(1-z^{2})^{-1/2},$
4.24.9   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arctan}z=\frac{1}{1+z^{2}}.$
4.24.10   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arccsc}z=\mp\frac{1}{z(z^{2}-1)^{1 /2}},$
4.24.11   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arcsec}z=\pm\frac{1}{z(z^{2}-1)^{1 /2}},$
4.24.12   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}\operatorname{arccot}z=-\frac{1}{1+z^{2}}.$
4.24.13   $\operatorname{Arcsin}u\pm\operatorname{Arcsin}v=\operatorname{Arcsin}\left(u(1 -v^{2})^{1/2}\pm v(1-u^{2})^{1/2}\right),$
4.24.14   $\operatorname{Arccos}u\pm\operatorname{Arccos}v=\operatorname{Arccos}\left(uv \mp((1-u^{2})(1-v^{2}))^{1/2}\right),$
4.24.15   $\operatorname{Arctan}u\pm\operatorname{Arctan}v=\operatorname{Arctan}\left( \frac{u\pm v}{1\mp uv}\right),$
4.24.16   $\operatorname{Arcsin}u\pm\operatorname{Arccos}v=\operatorname{Arcsin}\left(uv \pm((1-u^{2})(1-v^{2}))^{1/2}\right)=\operatorname{Arccos}\left(v(1-u^{2})^{1/ 2}\mp u(1-v^{2})^{1/2}\right),$
4.24.17   $\operatorname{Arctan}u\pm\operatorname{Arccot}v=\operatorname{Arctan}\left( \frac{uv\pm 1}{v\mp u}\right)=\operatorname{Arccot}\left(\frac{v\mp u}{uv\pm 1 }\right).$

4.26.1   $\int\sin x\mathrm{d}x=-\cos x,$
4.26.2   $\int\cos x\mathrm{d}x=\sin x.$
4.26.3   $\int\tan x\mathrm{d}x=-\ln\left(\cos x\right),$

4.26.5   $\int\sec x\mathrm{d}x={\operatorname{gd}^{-1}}\left(x\right),$

4.26.8   $\int e^{ax}\cos\left(bx\right)\mathrm{d}x=\frac{e^{ax}}{a^{2}+b^{2}}(a\cos \left(bx\right)+b\sin\left(bx\right)).$

4.26.13   $\int_{0}^{\infty}\sin\left(t^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=\int_{0}^{\infty}\cos\left( t^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{\frac{\pi}{2}}.$

4.26.19   $\int\operatorname{arccot}x\mathrm{d}x=x\operatorname{arccot}x+\tfrac{1}{2}\ln \left(1+x^{2}\right),$

5.11.13   $\frac{\Gamma\left(z+a\right)}{\Gamma\left(z+b\right)}\sim z^{a-b}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}\frac{G_{k}(a,b)}{z^{k}},$

5.13.2   ${\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}|\Gamma\left(a+it\right)|^{2}e^{(2b-\pi) t}\mathrm{d}t=\frac{\Gamma\left(2a\right)}{(2\sin b)^{2a}}},$
5.13.3   $\frac{1}{2\pi}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\Gamma\left(a+it\right)\Gamma\left(b+it \right)\Gamma\left(c-it\right)\Gamma\left(d-it\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{\Gamma \left(a+c\right)\Gamma\left(a+d\right)\Gamma\left(b+c\right)\Gamma\left(b+d \right)}{\Gamma\left(a+b+c+d\right)},$
5.13.4   $\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\frac{\mathrm{d}t}{\Gamma\left(a+t\right)\Gamma\left(b+ t\right)\Gamma\left(c-t\right)\Gamma\left(d-t\right)}=\frac{\Gamma\left(a+b+c+ d-3\right)}{\Gamma\left(a+c-1\right)\Gamma\left(a+d-1\right)\Gamma\left(b+c-1 \right)\Gamma\left(b+d-1\right)},$
5.13.5   $\frac{1}{4\pi}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\frac{\prod_{k=1}^{4}\Gamma\left(a_{k}+it \right)\Gamma\left(a_{k}-it\right)}{\Gamma\left(2it\right)\Gamma\left(-2it \right)}\mathrm{d}t=\frac{\prod_{1\leq j<k\leq 4}\Gamma\left(a_{j}+a_{k}\right )}{\Gamma\left(a_{1}+a_{2}+a_{3}+a_{4}\right)},$
5.13.5   $\Re(a_{k})>0$, $k=1,2,3,4$.
5.14.1   $\int_{V_{n}}t_{1}^{z_{1}-1}t_{2}^{z_{2}-1}\cdots t_{n}^{z_{n}-1}\mathrm{d}t_{1 }\mathrm{d}t_{2}\cdots\mathrm{d}t_{n}=\frac{\Gamma\left(z_{1}\right)\Gamma \left(z_{2}\right)\cdots\Gamma\left(z_{n}\right)}{\Gamma\left(1+z_{1}+z_{2}+ \dots+z_{n}\right)},$
5.14.2   $\int_{V_{n}}\left(1-\sum_{k=1}^{n}t_{k}\right)^{z_{n+1}-1}\prod_{k=1}^{n}t_{k} ^{z_{k}-1}\mathrm{d}t_{k}=\frac{\Gamma\left(z_{1}\right)\Gamma\left(z_{2} \right)\cdots\Gamma\left(z_{n+1}\right)}{\Gamma\left(z_{1}+z_{2}+\dots+z_{n+1} \right)}.$
5.14.3   $\Delta(t_{1},t_{2},\dots,t_{n})=\prod_{1\leq j<k\leq n}(t_{j}-t_{k}).$
5.14.4   $\int_{[0,1]^{n}}t_{1}t_{2}\cdots t_{m}|\Delta(t_{1},\dots,t_{n})|^{2c}\prod_{k =1}^{n}t_{k}^{a-1}(1-t_{k})^{b-1}\mathrm{d}t_{k}=\frac{1}{(\Gamma\left(1+c \right))^{n}}\prod_{k=1}^{m}\frac{a+(n-k)c}{a+b+(2n-k-1)c}\*\prod_{k=1}^{n} \frac{\Gamma\left(a+(n-k)c\right)\Gamma\left(b+(n-k)c\right)\Gamma\left(1+kc \right)}{\Gamma\left(a+b+(2n-k-1)c\right)},$
5.14.5   $\int_{[0,\infty)^{n}}t_{1}t_{2}\cdots t_{m}|\Delta(t_{1},\dots,t_{n})|^{2c} \prod_{k=1}^{n}t_{k}^{a-1}e^{-t_{k}}\mathrm{d}t_{k}=\prod_{k=1}^{m}(a+(n-k)c) \frac{\prod_{k=1}^{n}\Gamma\left(a+(n-k)c\right)\Gamma\left(1+kc\right)}{( \Gamma\left(1+c\right))^{n}},$
5.14.6   $\frac{1}{(2\pi)^{n/2}}\int_{(-\infty,\infty)^{n}}|\Delta(t_{1},\dots,t_{n})|^{ 2c}\prod_{k=1}^{n}\exp\left(-\tfrac{1}{2}t_{k}^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t_{k}=\frac {\prod_{k=1}^{n}\Gamma\left(1+kc\right)}{(\Gamma\left(1+c\right))^{n}},$

6.2.1   $E_{1}\left(z\right)=\int_{z}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-t}}{t}\mathrm{d}t,$
6.2.2   $E_{1}\left(z\right)=e^{-z}\int_{0}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-t}}{t+z}\mathrm{d}t,$
6.2.3   $\mathrm{Ein}\left(z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}\frac{1-e^{-t}}{t}\mathrm{d}t.$
6.2.4   $E_{1}\left(z\right)=\mathrm{Ein}\left(z\right)-\ln z-\gamma.$
6.2.5   $\mathrm{Ei}\left(x\right)=-\,\pvint_{-x}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-t}}{t}\mathrm{d}t= \pvint_{-\infty}^{x}\frac{e^{t}}{t}\mathrm{d}t,$
6.2.6   $\mathrm{Ei}\left(-x\right)=-\int_{x}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-t}}{t}\mathrm{d}t=-E_{1 }\left(x\right),$
6.2.7   $\mathrm{Ei}\left(\pm x\right)=-\mathrm{Ein}\left(\mp x\right)+\ln x+\gamma.$
6.2.8   $\mathrm{li}\left(x\right)=\pvint_{0}^{x}\frac{\mathrm{d}t}{\ln t}=\mathrm{Ei} \left(\ln x\right),$
6.2.9   $\mathrm{Si}\left(z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}\frac{\sin t}{t}\mathrm{d}t.$
6.2.10   $\mathrm{si}\left(z\right)=-\int_{z}^{\infty}\frac{\sin t}{t}\mathrm{d}t= \mathrm{Si}\left(z\right)-\tfrac{1}{2}\pi.$
6.2.11   $\mathrm{Ci}(z)=-\int_{z}^{\infty}\frac{\cos t}{t}\mathrm{d}t,$
6.2.12   $\mathrm{Cin}\left(z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}\frac{1-\cos t}{t}\mathrm{d}t.$
6.2.13   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(z\right)=-\mathrm{Cin}\left(z\right)+\ln z+\gamma.$
6.2.14   $\lim_{x\to\infty}\mathrm{Si}\left(x\right)=\tfrac{1}{2}\pi,$
6.2.14   $\lim_{x\to\infty}\mathrm{Ci}\left(x\right)=0.$
6.2.15   $\mathrm{Shi}\left(z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}\frac{\sinh t}{t}\mathrm{d}t,$
6.2.16   $\mathrm{Chi}\left(z\right)=\gamma+\ln z+\int_{0}^{z}\frac{\cosh t-1}{t}\mathrm {d}t.$
6.2.17   $\mathrm{f}\left(z\right)=\phantom{+}\mathrm{Ci}\left(z\right)\sin z-\mathrm{si }\left(z\right)\cos z,$
6.2.18   $\mathrm{g}\left(z\right)=-\mathrm{Ci}\left(z\right)\cos z-\mathrm{si}\left(z \right)\sin z.$
6.2.19   $\mathrm{Si}\left(z\right)=\tfrac{1}{2}\pi-\mathrm{f}\left(z\right)\cos z- \mathrm{g}\left(z\right)\sin z,$
6.2.20   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(z\right)=\mathrm{f}\left(z\right)\sin z-\mathrm{g}\left(z \right)\cos z.$
6.2.21   $\frac{\mathrm{d}\mathrm{f}\left(z\right)}{\mathrm{d}z}=-\mathrm{g}\left(z \right),$
6.2.21   $\frac{\mathrm{d}\mathrm{g}\left(z\right)}{\mathrm{d}z}=\mathrm{f}\left(z\right )-\frac{1}{z}.$

7.2.8   $S\left(z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}\sin\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi t^{2}\right)\mathrm{d}t,$

7.2.9   $\lim_{x\to\infty}S\left(x\right)=\tfrac{1}{2}.$

8.17.13   $(a+b)I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=aI_{x}\left(a+1,b\right)+bI_{x}\left(a,b+1\right),$
8.17.14   $(a+bx)I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=xbI_{x}\left(a-1,b+1\right)+aI_{x}\left(a+1,b \right),$
8.17.15   $(b+ax^{\prime})I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=ax^{\prime}I_{x}\left(a+1,b-1\right)+bI_{ x}\left(a,b+1\right),$
8.17.16   $aI_{x}\left(a+1,b\right)=(a+cx)I_{x}\left(a,b\right)-cxI_{x}\left(a-1,b\right),$
8.17.17   $bI_{x}\left(a,b+1\right)=(b+cx^{\prime})I_{x}\left(a,b\right)-cx^{\prime}I_{x} \left(a,b-1\right),$
8.17.18   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=I_{x}\left(a+1,b-1\right)+\frac{x^{a}(x^{\prime})^{b-1}} {a\mathrm{B}\left(a,b\right)},$
8.17.19   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=I_{x}\left(a-1,b+1\right)-\frac{x^{a-1}(x^{\prime})^{b}} {b\mathrm{B}\left(a,b\right)},$
8.17.20   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=I_{x}\left(a+1,b\right)+\frac{x^{a}(x^{\prime})^{b}}{a \mathrm{B}\left(a,b\right)},$
8.17.21   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=I_{x}\left(a,b+1\right)-\frac{x^{a}(x^{\prime})^{b}}{b \mathrm{B}\left(a,b\right)}.$
8.17.22   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=\frac{x^{a}(1-x)^{b}}{a\mathrm{B}\left(a,b\right)}\left( \cfrac{1}{1+\cfrac{d_{1}}{1+\cfrac{d_{2}}{1+\cfrac{d_{3}}{1+}}}}\cdots\right),$
8.17.23   $d_{2m}=\frac{m(b-m)x}{(a+2m-1)(a+2m)},$
8.17.23   $d_{2m+1}=-\frac{(a+m)(a+b+m)x}{(a+2m)(a+2m+1)}.$
8.17.24   $I_{x}\left(m,n\right)=(1-x)^{n}\sum_{j=m}^{\infty}\genfrac{(}{)}{0.0pt}{}{n+j- 1}{j}x^{j},$
8.18.1   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)={\Gamma\left(a+b\right)x^{a}(1-x)^{b-1}}\*\left(\sum_{k= 0}^{n-1}\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(a+k+1\right)\Gamma\left(b-k\right)}\left(\frac{x} {1-x}\right)^{k}+O\left(\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(a+n+1\right)}\right)\right),$
8.18.2   $\xi=-\ln x.$
8.18.3   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=\frac{\Gamma\left(a+b\right)}{\Gamma\left(a\right)}\left (\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}d_{k}F_{k}+O\left(a^{-n}\right)F_{0}\right),$
8.18.4   $aF_{k+1}=(k+b-a\xi)F_{k}+k\xi F_{k-1},$
8.18.5   $F_{0}=a^{-b}Q\left(b,a\xi\right),$
8.18.5   $F_{1}=\frac{b-a\xi}{a}F_{0}+\frac{\xi^{b}e^{-a\xi}}{a\Gamma\left(b\right)},$
8.18.6   $\left(\frac{1-e^{-t}}{t}\right)^{b-1}=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}d_{k}(t-\xi)^{k}.$
8.18.7   $d_{0}=\left(\frac{1-x}{\xi}\right)^{b-1},$
8.18.7   $d_{1}=\frac{x\xi+x-1}{(1-x)\xi}(b-1)d_{0}.$
8.18.8   $x_{0}=a/(a+b).$
8.18.9   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)\sim\tfrac{1}{2}\operatorname{erfc}\left(-\eta\sqrt{b/2} \right)+\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi(a+b)}}\*\left(\frac{x}{x_{0}}\right)^{a}\left( \frac{1-x}{1-x_{0}}\right)^{b}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}c_{k}(\eta)}{(a +b)^{k}},$
8.18.10   $-\tfrac{1}{2}\eta^{2}=x_{0}\ln\left(\frac{x}{x_{0}}\right)+(1-x_{0})\ln\left( \frac{1-x}{1-x_{0}}\right),$
8.18.11   $c_{0}(\eta)=\frac{1}{\eta}-\frac{\sqrt{x_{0}(1-x_{0})}}{x-x_{0}},$
8.18.12   $c_{0}(0)=\frac{1-2x_{0}}{3\sqrt{x_{0}(1-x_{0})}}.$
8.18.13   $\widetilde{\Gamma}(z)=(2\pi)^{-1/2}e^{z}z^{(1/2)-z}\Gamma\left(z\right),$
8.18.14   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)\sim Q\left(b,a\zeta\right)-\frac{(2\pi b)^{-1/2}}{ \widetilde{\Gamma}(b)}\left(\frac{x}{x_{0}}\right)^{a}\left(\frac{1-x}{1-x_{0} }\right)^{b}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{h_{k}(\zeta,\mu)}{a^{k}},$
8.18.15   $\mu\ln\zeta-\zeta=\ln x+\mu\ln\left(1-x\right)+(1+\mu)\ln\left(1+\mu\right)-\mu,$
8.18.16   $h_{0}(\zeta,\mu)=\mu\left(\frac{1}{\zeta-\mu}-\frac{(1+\mu)^{-3/2}}{x_{0}-x} \right),$
8.18.17   $h_{0}(\mu,\mu)=\frac{1}{3}\left(\frac{1-\mu}{\sqrt{1+\mu}}-1\right).$
8.18.18   $I_{x}\left(a,b\right)=p,$
8.19.1   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=z^{p-1}\Gamma\left(1-p,z\right).$
8.19.2   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=z^{p-1}\int_{z}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-t}}{t^{p}}\mathrm{d}t.$
8.19.3   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=\int_{1}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-zt}}{t^{p}}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.19.4   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=\frac{z^{p-1}e^{-z}}{\Gamma\left(p\right)}\int_{0}^{\infty }\frac{t^{p-1}e^{-zt}}{1+t}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.19.5   $E_{0}\left(z\right)=z^{-1}e^{-z},$
8.19.6   $E_{p}\left(0\right)=\frac{1}{p-1},$
8.19.7   $E_{n}\left(z\right)=\frac{(-z)^{n-1}}{(n-1)!}E_{1}\left(z\right)+\frac{e^{-z}} {(n-1)!}\sum_{k=0}^{n-2}(n-k-2)!(-z)^{k},$
8.19.7   $n=2,3,\dots$.
8.19.8   $E_{n}\left(z\right)=\frac{(-z)^{n-1}}{(n-1)!}(\psi\left(n\right)-\ln z)-\sum_{ \begin{subarray}{c}k=0\\ k\neq n-1\end{subarray}}^{\infty}\frac{(-z)^{k}}{k!(1-n+k)},$
8.19.9   $E_{n}\left(z\right)=\frac{(-1)^{n}z^{n-1}}{(n-1)!}\ln z+\frac{e^{-z}}{(n-1)!} \sum_{k=1}^{n-1}(-z)^{k-1}\Gamma\left(n-k\right)+\frac{e^{-z}(-z)^{n-1}}{(n-1) !}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{z^{k}}{k!}\psi\left(k+1\right),$
8.19.10   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=z^{p-1}\Gamma\left(1-p\right)-\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-z )^{k}}{k!(1-p+k)},$
8.19.11   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=\Gamma\left(1-p\right)\left(z^{p-1}-e^{-z}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}\frac{z^{k}}{\Gamma\left(2-p+k\right)}\right),$
8.19.12   $pE_{p+1}\left(z\right)+zE_{p}\left(z\right)=e^{-z}.$
8.19.13   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}E_{p}\left(z\right)=-E_{p-1}\left(z\right),$
8.19.14   $\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}z}(e^{z}E_{p}\left(z\right))=e^{z}E_{p}\left(z \right)\left(1+\frac{p-1}{z}\right)-\frac{1}{z}.$
8.19.15   $\frac{{\partial}^{j}E_{p}\left(z\right)}{{\partial p}^{j}}=(-1)^{j}\int_{1}^{ \infty}(\ln t)^{j}t^{-p}e^{-zt}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.19.16   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=z^{p-1}e^{-z}U\left(p,p,z\right).$
8.19.17   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=e^{-z}\left(\cfrac{1}{z+\cfrac{p}{1+\cfrac{1}{z+\cfrac{p+1 }{1+\cfrac{2}{z+\cdots}}}}}\right),$
8.19.18   $E_{p}\left(ze^{2m\pi i}\right)=\frac{2\pi ie^{mp\pi i}}{\Gamma\left(p\right)} \frac{\sin\left(mp\pi\right)}{\sin\left(p\pi\right)}z^{p-1}+E_{p}\left(z\right),$
8.19.23   $\int_{z}^{\infty}E_{p-1}\left(t\right)\mathrm{d}t=E_{p}\left(z\right),$
8.19.24   $\int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-at}E_{n}\left(t\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{(-1)^{n-1}}{a^{n} }\left(\ln\left(1+a\right)+\sum_{k=1}^{n-1}\frac{(-1)^{k}a^{k}}{k}\right),$
8.19.24   $n=1,2,\dots$, $\Re a>-1$,
8.19.25   $\int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-at}t^{b-1}E_{p}\left(t\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{\Gamma \left(b\right)(1+a)^{-b}}{p+b-1}\*F\left(1,b;p+b;a/(1+a)\right),$
8.19.26   $\int_{0}^{\infty}E_{p}\left(t\right)E_{q}\left(t\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{L(p)+ L(q)}{p+q-1},$
8.19.27   $L(p)=\int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-t}E_{p}\left(t\right)\mathrm{d}t=\frac{1}{2p}F\left( 1,1;1+p;\tfrac{1}{2}\right),$
8.2.1   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}t^{a-1}e^{-t}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.2.2   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=\int_{z}^{\infty}t^{a-1}e^{-t}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.2.3   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)+\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right),$
8.2.4   $P\left(a,z\right)=\frac{\gamma\left(a,z\right)}{\Gamma\left(a\right)},$
8.2.4   $Q\left(a,z\right)=\frac{\Gamma\left(a,z\right)}{\Gamma\left(a\right)},$
8.2.5   $P\left(a,z\right)+Q\left(a,z\right)=1.$
8.2.6   $\gamma^{*}\left(a,z\right)=z^{-a}P\left(a,z\right)=\frac{z^{-a}}{\Gamma\left(a \right)}\gamma\left(a,z\right).$
8.2.7   $\gamma^{*}\left(a,z\right)=\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(a\right)}\int_{0}^{1}t^{a-1}e^ {-zt}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.2.8   $\gamma\left(a,ze^{2\pi mi}\right)=e^{2\pi mia}\gamma\left(a,z\right),$
8.2.9   $\Gamma\left(a,ze^{2\pi mi}\right)=e^{2\pi mia}\Gamma\left(a,z\right)+(1-e^{2 \pi mia})\Gamma\left(a\right).$
8.2.10   $e^{-\pi ia}\Gamma\left(a,ze^{\pi i}\right)-e^{\pi ia}\Gamma\left(a,ze^{-\pi i} \right)=-\frac{2\pi i}{\Gamma\left(1-a\right)},$
8.2.11   $\Gamma\left(a,ze^{\pm\pi i}\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right)(1-z^{a}e^{\pm\pi ia} \gamma^{*}\left(a,-z\right)).$
8.2.12   $\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}w}{{\mathrm{d}z}^{2}}+\left(1+\frac{1-a}{z}\right)\frac{ \mathrm{d}w}{\mathrm{d}z}=0.$
8.2.13   $\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}w}{{\mathrm{d}z}^{2}}-\left(1+\frac{1-a}{z}\right)\frac{ \mathrm{d}w}{\mathrm{d}z}+\frac{1-a}{z^{2}}w=0.$
8.2.14   $z\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}\gamma^{*}}{{\mathrm{d}z}^{2}}+(a+1+z)\frac{\mathrm{d} \gamma^{*}}{\mathrm{d}z}+a\gamma^{*}=0.$
8.20.1   $E_{p}\left(z\right)=\frac{e^{-z}}{z}\left(\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}(-1)^{k}\frac{{\left (p\right)_{k}}}{z^{k}}+(-1)^{n}\frac{{\left(p\right)_{n}}e^{z}}{z^{n-1}}E_{n+p }\left(z\right)\right),$
8.20.1   $n=1,2,3,\dots$.
8.20.2   $E_{p}\left(z\right)\sim\frac{e^{-z}}{z}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{{\left (p\right)_{k}}}{z^{k}},$
8.20.3   $E_{p}\left(z\right)\sim\pm\frac{2\pi i}{\Gamma\left(p\right)}e^{\mp p\pi i}z^{ p-1}+\frac{e^{-z}}{z}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}{\left(p\right)_{k}}}{z^ {k}},$
8.20.4   $A_{k+1}(\lambda)=(1-2k\lambda)A_{k}(\lambda)+\lambda(\lambda+1)\frac{\mathrm{d }A_{k}(\lambda)}{\mathrm{d}\lambda},$
8.20.4   $k=0,1,2,\dots$,
8.20.5   $A_{1}(\lambda)=1,$
8.20.5   $A_{2}(\lambda)=1-2\lambda,$
8.20.5   $A_{3}(\lambda)=1-8\lambda+6\lambda^{2}.$
8.20.6   $E_{p}\left(\lambda p\right)\sim\frac{e^{-\lambda p}}{(\lambda+1)p}\sum_{k=0}^{ \infty}\frac{A_{k}(\lambda)}{(\lambda+1)^{2k}}\frac{1}{p^{k}},$
8.21.1   $\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right)\pm i\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right)=e^{\pm\frac{1}{2} \pi ia}\Gamma\left(a,ze^{\mp\frac{1}{2}\pi i}\right),$
8.21.2   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,z\right)\pm i\mathrm{Si}\left(a,z\right)=e^{\pm\frac{1}{2} \pi ia}\gamma\left(a,ze^{\mp\frac{1}{2}\pi i}\right).$
8.21.3   $\int_{0}^{\infty}t^{a-1}e^{\pm\mathrm{i}t}\mathrm{d}t=e^{\pm\frac{1}{2}\pi \mathrm{i}a}\Gamma\left(a\right),$
8.21.4   $\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right)=\int_{z}^{\infty}t^{a-1}\sin t\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.5   $\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right)=\int_{z}^{\infty}t^{a-1}\cos t\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.6   $\mathrm{Si}\left(a,z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}t^{a-1}\sin t\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.7   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,z\right)=\int_{0}^{z}t^{a-1}\cos t\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.8   $\mathrm{Si}\left(a,z\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right)\sin\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi a \right)-\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right),$
8.21.9   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,z\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right)\cos\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi a \right)-\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right),$
8.21.10   $\mathrm{si}\left(0,z\right)=-\mathrm{si}\left(z\right),$
8.21.10   $\mathrm{ci}\left(0,z\right)=-\mathrm{Ci}\left(z\right),$
8.21.11   $\mathrm{Si}\left(0,z\right)=\mathrm{Si}\left(z\right).$
8.21.12   $\mathrm{Si}\left(a,\infty\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right)\sin\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi a \right),$
8.21.13   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,\infty\right)=\Gamma\left(a\right)\cos\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\pi a \right),$
8.21.14   $\mathrm{Si}\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}z^{2k+1}}{(2 k+a+1)(2k+1)!},$
8.21.15   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}z^{2k}}{(2k+ a)(2k)!},$
8.21.16   $\mathrm{Si}\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{\left(2k+\frac{3}{2} \right){\left(1-\frac{1}{2}a\right)_{k}}}{{\left(\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}a \right)_{k+1}}}\mathsf{j}_{2k+1}\left(z\right),$
8.21.17   $\mathrm{Ci}\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{\left(2k+\frac{1}{2} \right){\left(\frac{1}{2}-\frac{1}{2}a\right)_{k}}}{{\left(\frac{1}{2}a\right) _{k+1}}}\mathsf{j}_{2k}\left(z\right),$
8.21.18   $f(a,z)=\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right)\cos z-\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right)\sin z,$
8.21.19   $g(a,z)=\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right)\sin z+\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right)\cos z.$
8.21.20   $\mathrm{si}\left(a,z\right)=f(a,z)\cos z+g(a,z)\sin z,$
8.21.21   $\mathrm{ci}\left(a,z\right)=-f(a,z)\sin z+g(a,z)\cos z.$
8.21.22   $f(a,z)=\int_{0}^{\infty}\frac{\sin t}{(t+z)^{1-a}}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.23   $g(a,z)=\int_{0}^{\infty}\frac{\cos t}{(t+z)^{1-a}}\mathrm{d}t.$
8.21.24   $f(a,z)=\frac{z^{a}}{2}\int_{0}^{\infty}\left((1+it)^{a-1}+(1-it)^{a-1}\right)e ^{-zt}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.21.25   $g(a,z)=\frac{z^{a}}{2i}\int_{0}^{\infty}\left((1-it)^{a-1}-(1+it)^{a-1}\right) e^{-zt}\mathrm{d}t.$
8.21.26   $f(a,z)\sim z^{a-1}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}{\left(1-a\right)_{2k}}}{z^ {2k}},$
8.21.27   $g(a,z)\sim z^{a-1}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^{k}{\left(1-a\right)_{2k+1}}}{ z^{2k+1}}.$
8.22.1   $F_{p}\left(z\right)=\frac{\Gamma\left(p\right)}{2\pi}z^{1-p}E_{p}\left(z\right )=\frac{\Gamma\left(p\right)}{2\pi}\Gamma\left(1-p,z\right),$
8.22.2   $\zeta_{x}(s)=\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(s\right)}\int_{0}^{x}\frac{t^{s-1}}{e^{t}-1} \mathrm{d}t,$
8.22.3   $\zeta_{x}(s)=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}k^{-s}P\left(s,kx\right),$
8.4.1   $\gamma\left(\tfrac{1}{2},z^{2}\right)=2\int_{0}^{z}e^{-t^{2}}\mathrm{d}t=\sqrt {\pi}\operatorname{erf}\left(z\right),$
8.4.2   $\gamma^{*}\left(a,0\right)=\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(a+1\right)},$
8.4.3   $\gamma^{*}\left(\tfrac{1}{2},-z^{2}\right)=\frac{2e^{z^{2}}}{z\sqrt{\pi}}F \left(z\right).$
8.4.4   $\Gamma\left(0,z\right)=\int_{z}^{\infty}t^{-1}e^{-t}\mathrm{d}t=E_{1}\left(z \right),$
8.4.5   $\Gamma\left(1,z\right)=e^{-z},$
8.4.6   $\Gamma\left(\tfrac{1}{2},z^{2}\right)=2\int_{z}^{\infty}e^{-t^{2}}\mathrm{d}t= \sqrt{\pi}\operatorname{erfc}\left(z\right).$
8.4.7   $\gamma\left(n+1,z\right)=n!(1-e^{-z}e_{n}(z)),$
8.4.8   $\Gamma\left(n+1,z\right)=n!e^{-z}e_{n}(z),$
8.4.9   $P\left(n+1,z\right)=1-e^{-z}e_{n}(z),$
8.4.10   $Q\left(n+1,z\right)=e^{-z}e_{n}(z),$
8.4.11   $e_{n}(z)=\sum_{k=0}^{n}\frac{z^{k}}{k!}.$
8.4.12   $\gamma^{*}\left(-n,z\right)=z^{n},$
8.4.13   $\Gamma\left(1-n,z\right)=z^{1-n}E_{n}\left(z\right),$
8.4.14   $Q\left(n+\tfrac{1}{2},z^{2}\right)=\operatorname{erfc}\left(z\right)+\frac{e^{ -z^{2}}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\sum_{k=1}^{n}\frac{z^{2k-1}}{{\left(\tfrac{1}{2}\right)_{ k}}},$
8.4.15   $\Gamma\left(-n,z\right)=\frac{(-1)^{n}}{n!}\left(E_{1}\left(z\right)-e^{-z} \sum_{k=0}^{n-1}\frac{(-1)^{k}k!}{z^{k+1}}\right)=\frac{(-1)^{n}}{n!}\left( \psi\left(n+1\right)-\ln z\right)-z^{-n}\sum_{\begin{subarray}{c}k=0\\ k\neq n\end{subarray}}^{\infty}\frac{(-z)^{k}}{k!(k-n)}.$
8.5.1   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=a^{-1}z^{a}e^{-z}M\left(1,1+a,z\right)=a^{-1}z^{a}M \left(a,1+a,-z\right),$
8.5.2   $\gamma^{*}\left(a,z\right)=e^{-z}{\mathbf{M}}\left(1,1+a,z\right)={\mathbf{M}} \left(a,1+a,-z\right).$
8.5.3   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=e^{-z}U\left(1-a,1-a,z\right)=z^{a}e^{-z}U\left(1,1+a,z \right).$
8.5.4   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=a^{-1}z^{\frac{1}{2}a-\frac{1}{2}}e^{-\frac{1}{2}z}M_{ \frac{1}{2}a-\frac{1}{2},\frac{1}{2}a}\left(z\right).$

8.6.1   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{z^{a}}{\sin\left(\pi a\right)}\int_{0}^{\pi}e^{z \cos t}\cos\left(at+z\sin t\right)\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.2   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=z^{\frac{1}{2}a}\int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-t}t^{\frac{1}{2}a- 1}J_{a}\left(2\sqrt{zt}\right)\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.3   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\int_{0}^{\infty}\exp\left(-at-ze^{-t}\right) \mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.4   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{z^{a}e^{-z}}{\Gamma\left(1-a\right)}\int_{0}^{ \infty}\frac{t^{-a}e^{-t}}{z+t}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.5   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}e^{-z}\int_{0}^{\infty}\frac{e^{-zt}}{(1+t)^{1-a}} \mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.6   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{2z^{\frac{1}{2}a}e^{-z}}{\Gamma\left(1-a\right)} \int_{0}^{\infty}e^{-t}t^{-\frac{1}{2}a}K_{a}\left(2\sqrt{zt}\right)\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.7   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=z^{a}\int_{0}^{\infty}\exp\left(at-ze^{t}\right)\mathrm {d}t,$
8.6.8   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{-\mathrm{i}z^{a}}{2\sin\left(\pi a\right)}\int_{- 1}^{(0+)}t^{a-1}e^{zt}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.9   $\Gamma\left(-a,ze^{\pm\pi i}\right)=\frac{e^{z}e^{\mp\pi\mathrm{i}a}}{\Gamma \left(1+a\right)}\int_{0}^{\infty}\frac{t^{a}e^{-zt}}{t-1}\mathrm{d}t,$
8.6.10   $\gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{c-i\infty}^{c+i\infty}\frac{ \Gamma\left(s\right)}{a-s}z^{a-s}\mathrm{d}s,$
8.6.11   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{c-i\infty}^{c+i\infty}\Gamma\left (s+a\right)\frac{z^{-s}}{s}\mathrm{d}s,$
8.6.12   $\Gamma\left(a,z\right)=-\frac{z^{a-1}e^{-z}}{\Gamma\left(1-a\right)}\*\frac{1} {2\pi i}\int_{c-i\infty}^{c+i\infty}\Gamma\left(s+1-a\right)\frac{\pi z^{-s}}{ \sin\left(\pi s\right)}\mathrm{d}s,$
8.7.1   $\gamma^{*}\left(a,z\right)=e^{-z}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{z^{k}}{\Gamma\left(a +k+1\right)}=\frac{1}{\Gamma\left(a\right)}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-z)^{k}}{ k!(a+k)}.$
8.7.2   $\gamma\left(a,x+y\right)-\gamma\left(a,x\right)=\Gamma\left(a,x\right)-\Gamma \left(a,x+y\right)=e^{-x}x^{a-1}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(1-a\right)_{n} }}{(-x)^{n}}(1-e^{-y}e_{n}(y)),$

9.13.12   $B_{n}\left(-z\right)=\begin{cases}-(\ifrac{2}{\sqrt{\pi}})\sin\left(\tfrac{1}{ 2}p\pi\right)z^{-n/4}\left(\sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)+e^{\left|\Im \zeta\right|}O\left(\zeta^{-1}\right)\right),&\left|\operatorname{ph}z\right| \leq 2p\pi-\delta,n\text{ odd},\\ (\ifrac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}})\sin\left(p\pi\right)z^{-n/4}e^{-\zeta}\left(1+O\left( \zeta^{-1}\right)\right),&\left|\operatorname{ph}z\right|\leq 3p\pi-\delta,n \text{ even}.\end{cases}$
9.13.13   $\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}w}{{\mathrm{d}t}^{2}}=\tfrac{1}{4}m^{2}t^{m-2}w,$
9.13.14   $m=n+2=1/p,	,$
9.13.14   $t=(\tfrac{1}{2}m)^{-2/m}z=\zeta^{2/m},	,$

9.13.16   $\sqrt{\pi}\left(\tfrac{1}{2}m\right)^{(m-2)/(2m)}\csc\left(\ifrac{\pi}{m} \right)B_{n}\left(z\right)=\begin{cases}U_{m}(-t),&m\text{ even},\\ \overline{V}_{m}(t),&m\text{ odd}.\end{cases}$

9.13.18   $w=U_{m}(te^{-2j\pi i/m}),$
9.13.18   $j=0,\pm 1,\pm 2,\ldots.$
9.13.19   $\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}w}{{\mathrm{d}x}^{2}}+x^{\alpha}w=0,$
9.13.20   $U_{1}(x,\alpha)=\frac{1}{(\alpha+2)^{1/(\alpha+2)}}\*\Gamma\left(\frac{\alpha+ 1}{\alpha+2}\right)x^{1/2}J_{-1/(\alpha+2)}\left(\frac{2}{\alpha+2}x^{(\alpha+ 2)/2}\right),$
9.13.21   $U_{2}(x,\alpha)=(\alpha+2)^{1/(\alpha+2)}\*\Gamma\left(\frac{\alpha+3}{\alpha+ 2}\right)x^{1/2}J_{1/(\alpha+2)}\left(\frac{2}{\alpha+2}x^{(\alpha+2)/2}\right),$
9.13.22   $\alpha=m-2,	,$
9.13.22   $x=(m/2)^{2/m}t,	,$

9.13.24   $U_{2}(x,\alpha)=\frac{\pi^{1/2}m^{2/m}}{2^{(m+2)/(2m)}\Gamma\left(-1/m\right)} \left(W_{m}(t){-}W_{m}(-t)\right).$
9.13.25   $A_{k}\left(z,p\right)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\mathscr{L}_{k}}t^{-p}\exp\left(zt -\tfrac{1}{3}t^{3}\right)\mathrm{d}t,$
9.13.25   $k=1,2,3$, $p\in\mathbb{C}$,
9.13.26   $B_{0}\left(z,p\right)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\mathscr{L}_{0}}t^{-p}\exp\left(zt -\tfrac{1}{3}t^{3}\right)\mathrm{d}t,$
9.13.26   $p=0,\pm 1,\pm 2,\ldots$,

9.13.27   $k=1,2,3$, $p=0,\pm 1,\pm 2,\ldots$,

9.7.11   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\left(-\sin\left( \zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k }}+\cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2 k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right),$
9.7.12   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(-z\right)\sim\frac{z^{1/4}}{\sqrt{\pi}}\left(\cos\left(\zeta -\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k+1 }}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right),$
9.7.13   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(ze^{\pm\pi i/3}\right)\mathrel{\sim}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\pi}}\frac {e^{\pm\pi i/6}}{z^{1/4}}\*\left(\cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2 }\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2}\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0} ^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{2k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right),$
9.7.14   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(ze^{\pm\pi i/3}\right)\mathrel{\sim}\sqrt{\frac{2}{\pi}}e^{ \mp\pi i/6}z^{1/4}\*\left(-\sin\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2} \mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k}}{\zeta^{2k}}+ \cos\left(\zeta-\tfrac{1}{4}\pi\mp\tfrac{1}{2}\mathrm{i}\ln 2\right)\sum_{k=0} ^{\infty}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{2k+1}}{\zeta^{2k+1}}\right),$
9.7.18   $\mathrm{Ai}\left(z\right)=\frac{e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}z^{1/4}}\left(\sum_{k=0 }^{n-1}(-1)^{k}\frac{u_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}+R_{n}(z)\right),$
9.7.19   $\mathrm{Ai}'\left(z\right)=-\frac{z^{1/4}e^{-\zeta}}{2\sqrt{\pi}}\left(\sum_{k =0}^{n-1}(-1)^{k}\frac{v_{k}}{\zeta^{k}}+S_{n}(z)\right),$
9.7.20   $R_{n}(z)=(-1)^{n}\sum_{k=0}^{m-1}(-1)^{k}u_{k}\frac{G_{n-k}\left(2\zeta\right) }{\zeta^{k}}+R_{m,n}(z),$
9.7.21   $S_{n}(z)=(-1)^{n-1}\sum_{k=0}^{m-1}(-1)^{k}v_{k}\frac{G_{n-k}\left(2\zeta \right)}{\zeta^{k}}+S_{m,n}(z),$
9.7.22   $G_{p}\left(z\right)=\frac{e^{z}}{2\pi}\Gamma\left(p\right)\Gamma\left(1-p,z \right).$
9.7.23   $R_{m,n}(z),S_{m,n}(z)=O\left(e^{-2|\zeta|}\zeta^{-m}\right),$
9.8.1   $\mathrm{Ai}\left(x\right)=M\left(x\right)\sin\theta\left(x\right),$
9.8.2   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(x\right)=M\left(x\right)\cos\theta\left(x\right),$
9.8.3   $M\left(x\right)=\sqrt{{\mathrm{Ai}^{2}}\left(x\right)+{\mathrm{Bi}^{2}}\left(x \right)},$
9.8.4   $\theta\left(x\right)=\operatorname{arctan}\left(\mathrm{Ai}\left(x\right)/ \mathrm{Bi}\left(x\right)\right).$
9.8.5   $\mathrm{Ai}'\left(x\right)=N\left(x\right)\sin\phi\left(x\right),$
9.8.6   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(x\right)=N\left(x\right)\cos\phi\left(x\right),$
9.8.7   $N\left(x\right)=\sqrt{{\mathrm{Ai}'^{2}}\left(x\right)+{\mathrm{Bi}'^{2}}\left (x\right)},$
9.8.8   $\phi\left(x\right)=\operatorname{arctan}\left(\mathrm{Ai}'\left(x\right)/ \mathrm{Bi}'\left(x\right)\right).$
9.8.9   $|x|^{1/2}{M^{2}}\left(x\right)=\tfrac{1}{2}\xi\left({J_{1/3}^{2}}\left(\xi \right)+{Y_{1/3}^{2}}\left(\xi\right)\right),$
9.8.10   $|x|^{-1/2}{N^{2}}\left(x\right)=\tfrac{1}{2}\xi\left({J_{2/3}^{2}}\left(\xi \right)+{Y_{2/3}^{2}}\left(\xi\right)\right),$
9.8.11   $\theta\left(x\right)=\tfrac{2}{3}\pi+\operatorname{arctan}\left(Y_{1/3}\left( \xi\right)/J_{1/3}\left(\xi\right)\right),$
9.8.12   $\phi\left(x\right)=\tfrac{1}{3}\pi+\operatorname{arctan}\left(Y_{2/3}\left(\xi \right)/J_{2/3}\left(\xi\right)\right).$
9.8.13   $M\left(x\right)N\left(x\right)\sin\left(\theta\left(x\right)-\phi\left(x\right )\right)=\pi^{-1},$
9.8.14   ${M^{2}}\left(x\right)\theta'\left(x\right)=-\pi^{-1},	,$
9.8.14   ${N^{2}}\left(x\right)\phi'\left(x\right)=\pi^{-1}x,	,$
9.8.14   $N\left(x\right)N'\left(x\right)=xM\left(x\right)M'\left(x\right),	,$
9.8.15   ${N^{2}}\left(x\right)={M'^{2}}\left(x\right)+{M^{2}}\left(x\right){\theta'^{2} }\left(x\right)={M'^{2}}(x)+\pi^{-2}{M^{-2}}\left(x\right),$
9.8.16   $x^{2}{M^{2}}\left(x\right)={N'^{2}}\left(x\right)+{N^{2}}\left(x\right){\phi'^ {2}}\left(x\right)={N'^{2}}\left(x\right)+\pi^{-2}x^{2}{N^{-2}}\left(x\right),$
9.8.17   $\tan\left(\theta\left(x\right)-\phi\left(x\right)\right)=1/(\pi M\left(x\right )M'\left(x\right))=-M\left(x\right)\theta'\left(x\right)/M'\left(x\right),$
9.8.18   $M''\left(x\right)=xM\left(x\right)+\pi^{-2}{M^{-3}}\left(x\right),	,$
9.8.18   ${M^{2}}'''\left(x\right)-4x{M^{2}}'\left(x\right)-2{M^{2}}\left(x\right)=0,$
9.8.19   ${\theta'^{2}}\left(x\right)+\tfrac{1}{2}(\theta'''\left(x\right)/\theta'\left( x\right))-\tfrac{3}{4}(\theta''\left(x\right)/\theta'\left(x\right))^{2}=-x.$
9.8.20   ${M^{2}}\left(x\right)\sim\frac{1}{\pi(-x)^{1/2}}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{1 \cdot 3\cdot 5\cdots(6k-1)}{k!(96)^{k}}\frac{1}{x^{3k}},$
9.8.21   ${N^{2}}\left(x\right)\sim\frac{(-x)^{1/2}}{\pi}\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{1\cdot 3 \cdot 5\cdots(6k-1)}{k!(96)^{k}}\frac{1+6k}{1-6k}\frac{1}{x^{3k}},$
9.9.1   $\theta\left(a_{k}\right)=\phi\left(a^{\prime}_{k+1}\right)=k\pi,$
9.9.2   $\theta\left(b_{k}\right)=\phi\left(b^{\prime}_{k}\right)=(k-\tfrac{1}{2})\pi.$
9.9.3   $\mathrm{Ai}'\left(a_{k}\right)=\frac{(-1)^{k-1}}{\pi M\left(a_{k}\right)},$
9.9.3   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(b_{k}\right)=\frac{(-1)^{k-1}}{\pi M\left(b_{k}\right)},$
9.9.4   $\mathrm{Ai}\left(a^{\prime}_{k}\right)=\frac{(-1)^{k-1}}{\pi N\left(a^{\prime} _{k}\right)},$
9.9.4   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(b^{\prime}_{k}\right)=\frac{(-1)^{k}}{\pi N\left(b^{\prime}_{ k}\right)}.$
9.9.5   $\mathrm{Ai}'\left(a_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}\left(-\frac{\mathrm{d}a_{k}}{\mathrm {d}k}\right)^{-1/2},$
9.9.5   $\mathrm{Ai}\left(a^{\prime}_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}\left(a^{\prime}_{k}\frac{ \mathrm{d}a^{\prime}_{k}}{\mathrm{d}k}\right)^{-1/2}.$
9.9.6   $a_{k}=-T\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-1)\right),$
9.9.7   $\mathrm{Ai}'\left(a_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}V\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-1)\right),$
9.9.8   $a^{\prime}_{k}=-U\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3)\right),$
9.9.9   $\mathrm{Ai}\left(a^{\prime}_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}W\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3) \right).$
9.9.10   $b_{k}=-T\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3)\right),$
9.9.11   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(b_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}V\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3)\right),$
9.9.12   $b^{\prime}_{k}=-U\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-1)\right),$
9.9.13   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(b^{\prime}_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k}W\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-1) \right).$
9.9.14   $\beta_{k}=e^{\pi i/3}T\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-1)+\tfrac{3}{4}i\ln 2\right),$
9.9.15   $\mathrm{Bi}'\left(\beta_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k}\sqrt{2}e^{-\pi i/6}V\left(\tfrac{3 }{8}\pi(4k-1)+\tfrac{3}{4}i\ln 2\right),$
9.9.16   $\beta^{\prime}_{k}=e^{\pi i/3}U\left(\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3)+\tfrac{3}{4}i\ln 2 \right),$
9.9.17   $\mathrm{Bi}\left(\beta^{\prime}_{k}\right)=(-1)^{k-1}\sqrt{2}e^{\pi i/6}W\left (\tfrac{3}{8}\pi(4k-3)+\tfrac{3}{4}i\ln 2\right).$
